extracted_playbook.title: Consult Log4j Vulnerability Guidance
extracted_playbook.description: Consult the joint Cybersecurity Advisory titled 'Mitigating Log4Shell and Other Log4j-Related Vulnerabilities' and CISA’s 'Apache Log4j Vulnerability' guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify and Upgrade Log4j Assets
extracted_playbook.description: Identify assets affected by Log4Shell and other Log4j-related vulnerabilities and upgrade Log4j assets and affected products to the latest version.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Vendor Software Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Remain alert to vendor software updates and initiate hunt and incident response procedures to detect possible Log4Shell exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult Web Shell Malware Guidance
extracted_playbook.description: Consult the NSA and Australian Signals Directorate’s report titled 'Detect and Prevent Web Shell Malware' for mitigating actions to identify and recover from web shells.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Inventory and Apply Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain an inventory of systems and applications, and rapidly apply patches as they are released.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Reverse Proxies
extracted_playbook.description: Put vulnerable or potentially risky systems behind reverse proxies that require authentication.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy and Configure WAFs
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy and configure Web Application Firewalls (WAFs) to protect web-facing servers.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Endpoint Monitoring
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy endpoint agents or other monitoring mechanisms to detect adversary activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Unnecessary Outbound Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Block unnecessary outbound connections to prevent adversary activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Admin Panels
extracted_playbook.description: Block external access to administrator panels and services or turn them off entirely.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Network
extracted_playbook.description: Segment the network to prevent lateral movement from a compromised web server to critical assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Command-Line Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor for suspicious command-line activity to detect malicious actions.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multi-factor authentication for remote access services to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Allow-Listing Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Properly segment and use allow-listing tools for critical assets to protect against malicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Check for Security Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Check for security vulnerabilities, apply patches, and update to the latest version of software.

extracted_playbook.title: Encrypt Sensitive Data
extracted_playbook.description: Encrypt all sensitive data including personal information to protect against unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Access to Unused Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Block access to unused ports to reduce attack surface.

extracted_playbook.title: Change Compromised Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Change passwords when they are suspected of being compromised to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Alert on Dual-Use Applications
extracted_playbook.description: Alert on unexpected use of dual-use applications to detect potential malicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Strengthen Subscriber Identity Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Strengthen the subscriber identity authentication process for leased servers to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspicious DPRK Activities
extracted_playbook.description: Report suspicious activities related to suspected DPRK cyber activities to relevant authorities.
